Analysis – Derived Columns
Added Time_Period (derived from Time using hour ranges) to categorize accidents into Morning, Afternoon, Evening, and Night for temporal trend analysis.
Added Exp_Order (ordinal encoding of Driving_experience) to numerically represent experience levels for modeling and correlation analysis.
Analysis – KPIs
Added Total Accidents (COUNT of all accident records) to measure overall accident frequency in the dataset.
Added Total Casualties (SUM of Number_of_casualties) to capture the total human impact across all reported accidents.
Added Serious Accidents % (COUNT of Serious Injury accidents ÷ Total Accidents × 100) to quantify the proportion of high-severity cases.
Added Fatal Accidents % (COUNT of Fatal injury accidents ÷ Total Accidents × 100) to measure the percentage of fatal outcomes.
Added Serious Injury % (COUNT of Serious Injury casualties ÷ Total Casualties × 100) to evaluate the share of serious injuries among all victims.
Added Slight Injury % (COUNT of Slight Injury casualties ÷ Total Casualties × 100) to assess the proportion of minor injuries.
Added Most Common Cause (MODE of Cause_of_accident) to identify the dominant behavioral or operational risk factor.
Analysis – Pivot Tables
Added Accident Severity by Road Surface, Light Condition, and Weather to analyze how environmental conditions influence accident severity distribution.
Added Accident Severity by Light Conditions to compare fatal, serious, and slight injuries under daylight and different darkness conditions.
Added Accident Severity by Cause of Accident to identify which behavioral factors are associated with higher fatal and serious outcomes.
Added Accident Severity by Type of Vehicle to examine how vehicle category influences severity distribution.
Added Casualty Severity by Casualty Class to compare impact levels among Drivers, Passengers, and Pedestrians.
Added Accident Severity by Day of Week to evaluate temporal patterns in accident frequency and severity.
Added Accident Severity by Driving Experience to assess how experience level affects fatal and serious accident proportions.
Added Accident Severity by Age Band and Driving Experience (Exp_Order) to analyze interaction between driver age and experience level.
Added Severity Percentage (Serious + Fatal %) by Driving Experience to compare high-risk proportions across experience categories.
